components.description:
A symbol commonly used to represent those in the transgender community. Used within the draft emoji sequence for the Transgender Flag emoji, and also given emoji presentation on Samsung devices.

Shows as a plain text character on other platforms.
components.title: Male with Stroke and Male and Female Sign

description:
A symbol commonly used to represent those in the transgender community. Used within the draft emoji sequence for the Transgender Flag emoji, and also given emoji presentation on Samsung devices.

Shows as a plain text character on other platforms.
title: Male with Stroke and Male and Female Sign

version.description: The following characters we added to Unicode in 2005 and given emoji presentation status in the years 2010-2015.

apple_vendor_description: The transgender symbol emoji on Apple devices is a beautifully rendered icon, featuring the classic Venus and Mars symbols merged with the Mars symbol’s arrow, all presented with Apple's signature smooth gradients and soft, rounded edges. Its clean lines and subtle depth give it a polished, empowering appearance, reflecting Apple's inclusive design philosophy. This emoji is a powerful representation of transgender identity, pride, and solidarity in digital communication.
